thread.title: Drilling boom brings rising number of harmful waste spills
thread.title_full: Drilling boom brings rising number of harmful waste spills

title: Drilling boom brings rising number of harmful waste spills
text: Drilling boom brings rising number of harmful waste spills Tuesday, 8 September 2015 (4 minutes ago) Carl Johnson and son Justin are third- and fourth-generation ranchers who for decades have battled oilfield companies that left a patchwork of barren earth where the men graze cattle in the high plains of New Mexico. Blunt and profane, they stroll across a 1 1/2-acre patch of sandy soil -- lifeless, save for a scattering of stunted weeds.
